title.rendered: Hospitality Executive Brian Ehrlich Joins Lodging Dynamics as Vice President of Business Development

content.rendered:
PROVO, Utah, Oct. 24, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — Lodging Dynamics Hospitality Group (Lodging Dynamics), a leading hotel management company, today announced the appointment of Brian Ehrlich as its Vice President of Business Development. Brian will be pivotal in leading the company’s growth and be a vital part of the executive team, helping shape the company’s strategic direction.


Continue Reading

With over twenty years of hospitality experience, Brian is a seasoned veteran in the industry, working with premium brand hotels and resorts in major markets throughout the United States. As a business development executive and as an advisor to private equity groups, Brian closed and facilitated significant third-party management contracts throughout his career. At Kimpton Hotels and Resorts, he led the brand’s expansion in vital core markets while serving as Vice President and Head of Acquisitions for the Western States.

“I’m excited to be a part of the world-class team that Lodging Dynamics has put together. The leadership, strategic direction, and quality of service they provide are among the industry’s best,” said Brian. “Lodging Dynamics has developed a unique ability to provide exceptional results for all key stakeholders while fostering a focused, cohesive, and caring culture,” he concluded.

In addition to his business development involvement, Brian has extensive investment experience as an owner, executive, or advisor with several hotel private equity portfolios. As a principal, chief investment officer, or advisor, he has been instrumental in acquiring or developing portfolio assets valued at $3 billion. While Chief Investment Officer for hotels at Ensemble Investments, Brian oversaw their expansion in crucial East and West Coast markets.

“We are thrilled to add Brian to our world-class executive team. He has an ideal background to drive our growth while adding value to our customers as they consider their strategic initiatives,” said Jamie Caraher,” President and CEO of Lodging Dynamics. “As we look ahead, his leadership will be vital in helping shape our company’s future,” concluded Jamie.

Brian earned a BS from Harvard University, where he played on the basketball and volleyball teams. 

About Lodging Dynamics Hospitality Group

Based in Provo, Utah, Lodging Dynamics Hospitality Group is a nationally recognized, award-winning operator of premium-brand, select service, and extended-stay hotels and one of a few third-party operators approved by Marriott and Hilton. Founded in 1991 after developing the first Marriott franchise in Utah, Lodging Dynamics continues its long history by providing award-winning operating services for hotels throughout the continental United States and Hawaii. The company has managed hotels in the Marriott, Hilton, Hyatt, and IHG premium-brand families. For more information, visit www.lodgingdynamics.com.

SOURCE Lodging Dynamics Hospitality Group

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/hospitality-executive-brian-ehrlich-joins-lodging-dynamics-as-vice-president-of-business-development-301965123.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
